SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRT_AT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM(A.PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_KOR_NM , A.CMPL_YR , A.CONST_NO , A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE) APP_PRT_AT_KOR_NM , A.APP_AGENT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(A.APP_AGENT_CODE) APP_AGENT_NAME , A.USE_NO , A.AGENT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(A.AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NAME , NVL(A.EXMP_AMNT, 0) EXMP_AMNT , NVL(A.EXMP_ACC, 0) EXMP_ACC , TO_CHAR(A.PERIOD_FR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PERIOD_FR , TO_CHAR(A.PERIOD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PERIOD_TO , A.EXMP_COND , (CASE WHEN A.RATE_GUBUN = '1' THEN '과거' WHEN A.RATE_GUBUN = '2' THEN '현재' ELSE '' END) AS RATE_GUBUN , A.REMARK , A.ITEM , A.USE_YN , A.BZ_RGST_ID , TO_CHAR(A.APPL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPL_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.PERF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PERF_DT , (NVL(A.EXMP_AMNT, 0) - NVL(A.EXMP_ACC, 0)) EXMP_REMAIN , F.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(A.PRT_AT_CODE, F.FEE_TP) FEE_TP_KOR_NM FROM SOC_APPLY_F@YGPA_P2MGR A INNER JOIN SOC_FEE_F@YGPA_P2MGR F ON A.PRT_AT_CODE = F.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.CMPL_YR = F.CMPL_YR AND A.CONST_NO = F.CONST_NO AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = F.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = F.APP_AGENT_CODE AND A.USE_NO = F.USE_NO
WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode#
AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode#
AND F.FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
ORDER BY A.PRT_AT_CODE, A.APP_AGENT_CODE, A.CMPL_YR, A.CONST_NO, F.FEE_TP ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT , SUM(NVL(A.EXMP_AMNT, 0)) SUM_EXMP_AMNT , SUM(NVL(A.EXMP_ACC, 0)) SUM_EXMP_ACC , (SUM(NVL(A.EXMP_AMNT, 0)) - SUM(NVL(A.EXMP_ACC, 0))) SUM_EXMP_REMAIN FROM SOC_APPLY_F@YGPA_P2MGR A INNER JOIN SOC_FEE_F@YGPA_P2MGR F ON A.PRT_AT_CODE = F.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.CMPL_YR = F.CMPL_YR AND A.CONST_NO = F.CONST_NO AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = F.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = F.APP_AGENT_CODE AND A.USE_NO = F.USE_NO WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode#
AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode#
AND F.FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
